channel.title: HOw to set xp per hit
channel.description: How can i change the xp per hiting monster , atm if i hit 1 i gain 8 xp , i want it higher , i've looked a lot , can't find it anywhere and dont want to make ppl train on dummies. PLEASE help , when i know how to do it my server is finally ready...

item.title: HOw to set xp per hit
item.dc:creator: @Fr33b1e Fr33b1e
item.description:
@Fr33b1e wrote:

Np, I just know this because I was tired of hitting dummies countless times for EXP, so I searched around my client, and found it. Glad to help. (y)

Read full topic

item.title: HOw to set xp per hit
item.dc:creator: @wicked_pker wicked pker
item.description:
@wicked_pker wrote:

find in cient.java

public int getXPForLevel(int level) {

then replace all you got

[code]public int getXPForLevel(int level) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		if (lvl >= level) {
			return output;
		}
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
	}
	return 0;
}

public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
	int points = 0;
	int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 99; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 99;
}[/code]

thats then 1200 per hit dont change any higher beacuse it will be messed up

Read full topic
